TextBlock.Text: AMYLAX: Okalis, I have left a gift for you here, I hope you like it!

OKALIS: It is wonderful, Amylax! I fail to recall ever seeing such an intricate necklace, much less one woven from vines! There was no need to come all the way to <color=orange>Graviton’s Folly</color> to deliver it though. I understand that the inverted gravity is uncomfortable to navigate with your echolocation.
AMYLAX: I’m glad to hear that you like it. I just... I thought that it was important enough to deliver it myself, even if that meant just leaving it in your house.
OKALIS: Well, I very much appreciate it! I will accept it as a surefire token of the continued friendship between ourselves and our species!
